Service Details: - Educates the public about a variety of safety issues and through the provision of safety training- Ofers motorcycle training courses that include Learn to Ride, Customized Learn to Ride, Private Training, Advanced Riding Techniques, workshops and events- Offers drivers training courses that include Driving Lessons, GLP (Graduated License Program) Training, International Student & Immigrant Drivers, Corporate Defensive Driving, Senior Drivers Training, and Driver Licensing in BC
